## Introduction

[Modeling and Simulation in Python](https://allendowney.github.io/ModSimPy/index.html#modeling-and-simulation-in-python) for free. It is also [available at Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/Modeling-Simulation-Python-Allen-Downey/dp/1718502168/ref=sr_1_30?crid=137KILFRCT9FY&keywords=python&qid=1690484333&sprefix=python%2Caps%2C116&sr=8-30) for $35. It has ipynb files available at the free link.

[SimPy](https://simpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html) is a process-based discrete-event simulation framework based on standard Python.
